model_answer: The segment occurs in option C: [00:05:04 - 00:06:08].

The correct answer is A: [00:03:02 - 00:03:27]. The on-screen text appears from 00:03:02 to 00:03:27 and says "Just say Tenacity" during the speech where the speaker is encouraging someone to start wrestling. The sound of a door interrupting the speech occurs later in the video at 00:05:59.
